By having his fire and wind masks merge, with or without him, Kakuzu has them combine their [[Fire Release: Intelligent Hard Work|fire]] and [[Wind Release: Pressure Damage|wind]] attacks to create a powerful blast of intense fire. [[Kakashi]] remarked that water alone wasn't enough to put it out.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 336, page 12</ref> It took the effort of a [[Typhoon Water Vortex Technique|wind-enhanced water technique]] to fully counter it.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 337, page 16</ref>

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2]]''.
* In ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', this technique is called {{translation|Earth Grudge Fear: Simultaneous Arson|地怨虞・一斉放火|Jiongu: Issei Hōka}}.
